name: MTLRenderPipelineFunctionsDescriptor
desc: A collection of functions for updating a render pipeline.

items.name: var vertexAdditionalBinaryFunctions: [MTLFunction]?
items.desc: The vertex functions to add to the render pipeline.

items.name: var fragmentAdditionalBinaryFunctions: [MTLFunction]?
items.desc: The fragment functions to add to the render pipeline.

items.name: var tileAdditionalBinaryFunctions: [MTLFunction]?
items.desc: The tile functions to add to the render pipeline.
